item.name: Marketing Emails
Get the variation of a an A/B marketing email

request.description: This endpoint lets you obtain the variation of an A/B marketing email. If the email is variation A (master) it will return variation B (variant) and vice versa.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Reset Draft

request.description: Resets the draft back to a copy of the live object.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Restore a revision of a marketing email to DRAFT state

request.description: Restores a previous revision of a marketing email to DRAFT state. If there is currently something in the draft for that object, it is overwritten.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Get draft version of a marketing email

request.description: Get the draft version of an email (if it exists). If no draft version exists, the published email is returned.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Create or update draft version

request.description: Create or update the draft version of a marketing email. If no draft exists, the system creates a draft from the current “live” email then applies the request body to that draft. The draft version only lives on the buffer—the email is not cloned.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Get revisions of a marketing email

The cursor token value to get the previous set of results. You can get this from the `paging.prev.before` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.
The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

request.description: Get a list of all versions of a marketing email, with each entry including the full state of that particular version. The current revision has the ID -1.

response.name: successful operation

item.name: Get all marketing emails for a HubSpot account.

Only return emails last updated before the specified time.

item.name: Publish or send a marketing email.

request.description: If you have a Marketing Hub Enterprise account or the transactional email add-on, you can use this endpoint to publish an automated email or send/schedule a regular email.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

item.name: Create an A/B test variation of a marketing email.

request.description: Create a variation of a marketing email for an A/B test. The new variation will be created as a draft. If an active variation already exists, a new one won't be created.

response.name: successful operation

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Unpublish or cancel a marketing email.

request.description: If you have a Marketing Hub Enterprise account or the transactional email add-on, you can use this endpoint to unpublish an automated email or cancel a regular email. If the email is already in the process of being sent, canceling might not be possible.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

item.name: Clone a marketing email.

request.description: This will create a duplicate email with the same properties as the original, with the exception of a unique ID.

response.name: successful operation
